Contact Details: Author: Community and Mental Health Team, NHS Digital Responsible Statistician: Tom Poupart Public Enquiries: Telephone: 0300 303 5678  Email: enquiries@nhsdigital.nhs.uk
Description: This publication provides the most detailed picture available of people who used NHS funded secondary mental health, learning disabilities and autism services in England during the ficial year 2017-18.
Name: Mental Health Bulletin
Notes: 2 XLS spreadsheets  contain the reference tables, Metadata and data quality tables and a machine readable CSV data file
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found by clicking on the link under latest version scroll to resources and 3 files are located under resource.  2 XLS spreadsheets  contain the reference tables, Metadata and data quality tables and a machine readable CSV data file
Sizing Notes: Although initially this looks complicated with 41 tables with footnotes a CSV file is available and machine readable metadata, although some up front work may be required to determine what the dimensions should be named.  May be better suited to the mental heath family.
